message.body: Any more word from mom about coming down?
Call her and ask. She just meeds to let isk ow what she wants to do about snoop. Im ready to book the hotel now.
If you book 21+ days in advance, its usually the best rate.
Have you figured everything out w the car for her?
I haven't even looked yet. I will check today if I have a second. It's been so busy.
I think I can get mom a car for 200 dollars.
I thinks she has to have my credit card tho
You have to send her the cash, so she can deposit it into her bank account and used her own card
They will only use the drivers card with the drivers name printed on it
But remember they are going to hold the deposit too
So if the car is $200 and the deposit is 250 she is going to need $550. I can help if you need.
Okay

Also make sure her car insurance is valid because she can use her insurance to cover the rental. She will just have to change her policy to full coverage for a week. Thats what i do. It saves from paying $40 a day for their imsurance
Great. Thanks for the info.
I think mom found a hotel!
The one thats an hour away from philly?
Yeah
The price online is $140 q night
Ask here where she saw it cheaper and i though we wanted to stay in the city
I told her to look on the mainline
This all sounds promising though!
Okay you guys just let me know what you want to do. Id hate to spend the same amount we would in the city. I know its a bigger room though
Oh its near longwood garden and kind of prussia!!! I want to go there!!
Ok so for 3 nights it would actually be $300 for 2 bedrooms, queens in each and a pull out sofa.
The room is only 89 plus tax on hotels.com. Non refundable.
And their parking is free which is nice. Philly is $40 a night per car almost everywhere
Do you have that monday off?
The 23rd?
I was thinking we can get there before mom and decorate the room for xmas a little
Cool
I think I have that off!
